title: Function of the Broadcasting Authority

content.text: It shall be the function of the Broadcasting Authority to ensure that, so far as possible, in such sound and television broadcasting services as may be provided in Malta, due impartiality is preserved in respect of matters of political or industrial controversy or relating to current public policy and that broadcasting facilities and time are fairly apportioned between persons belonging to different political parties.

notes: This article specifies the primary function of the Broadcasting Authority, which is to ensure impartiality in broadcasting on matters of political or industrial controversy or current public policy, and to ensure fair allocation of broadcasting facilities and time between different political parties.
